opening_theme: #1: "Seisho: Bible (誓書-バイブル-)" by PEARL (1st phase)
#2: "Kagayaki no Byousha (輝きの描写)" by Junko Kawada (2nd phase)
#3: "Seishun no Sagashimono (青春のさがしもの)" by Junko Kawada (3rd phase)
ending_theme: #1: "Chiisana Kesshin (小さな決心)" by Shinobu Nakayama (1st phase)
#2: "Yume wo Oikakete (夢を追いかけて)" by Mariko Yoshida (2nd phase)
#3: "Kimi no Yume no Tame ni (君の夢のために)" by Junko Kawada (3rd phase)
#4: "Seishun no Evergreen (青春のEVERGREEN)" by Mamiko Tayama (4th phase)
